attributes.action: Arm all police dogs with stab proof vest!
attributes.additional_details: Why can't they have same protection as police officers they do the same job
attributes.background: PD Finn, was stabbed last Tuesday in an incident in Stevenage. This brave lad is now HOME and getting stronger by the day. I've heard during the incident he grabbed the offenders leg and refused to let go even after being stabbed twice. Once through the lung.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168678
